remoteport.description: The remote port this rule applies to

direction.description: Is this rule for inbound or outbound traffic

protocol.description: The protocol this rule applies to

service.description: The service this rule applies to

enabled.description: Is this firewall rule enabled or disabled

profiles.description: The profile this rule applies to

localport.description: The local port this rule applies to

localip.description: The local ip address this rule applies to

state.description: Should this rule be added or removed

program.description: The program this rule applies to

remoteip.description: The remote ip address/range this rule applies to

action.description: What to do with the items this rule is for

force.description: Replace any existing rule by removing it first.
